template.name: Template SNMP ECESSA
template.description: This template created based on ECESSA PowerLink PL1200, ver. 10.5.2 device

item_prototype.name: LAN '$1 interface' IP address
item_prototype.description: The IP address of this LAN interface

item_prototype.name: LAN '$1 interface' netmask
item_prototype.description: The net mask address of this LAN interface

item_prototype.name: LAN '$1 interface' port number
item_prototype.description: The physical ethernet port that this interface operates on.

item_prototype.name: LAN '$1 interface' RX packets
item_prototype.description: The accumulative packets that this interface received

item_prototype.name: LAN '$1 interface' TX packets
item_prototype.description: The accumulative packets that this interface transmitted

item_prototype.name: LAN '$1 interface' VLAN ID
item_prototype.description: 802.1q (VLAN) Identifier is used to associate the interface with a given virtual LAN.

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' Active Sessions
item_prototype.description: Number of all active sessions

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' Downlink speed
item_prototype.description: Link speed bandwidth in kilobits per second of incoming traffic.

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' IP address
item_prototype.description: The IP address of this WAN interface

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' netmask
item_prototype.description: The net mask address of this WAN interface

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' port number
item_prototype.description: The physical ethernet port that this interface operates on

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' router
item_prototype.description: Router IP (gateway) address for this Wan interface

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' RX bytes
item_prototype.description: The accumulative bytes that this interface received

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' RX packets
item_prototype.description: The accumulative packets that this interface received

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' satus
item_prototype.description: The current operational state of the interface. The down(2) state indicates that no operational packets can be passed

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' TestPoint 1 IP address
item_prototype.description: The IP address of this test point interface

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' TestPoint 1 Status
item_prototype.description: The current operational state of the test point. The down(2) state indicates that no round trip time could measured. The destination could not be reached

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' TestPoint 1 Trip Time
item_prototype.description: The measured round trip time of this test point

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' TestPoint 2 IP address
item_prototype.description: The IP address of 2nd test point interface

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' TestPoint 2 Status
item_prototype.description: The current operational state of the test point. The down(2) state indicates that no round trip time could measured. The destination could not be reached

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' TestPoint 2 Trip Time
item_prototype.description: The measured round trip time of this test point

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' TestPoint 3 IP address
item_prototype.description: The IP address of this test point interface

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' TestPoint 3 Status
item_prototype.description: The current operational state of the test point. The down(2) state indicates that no round trip time could measured. The destination could not be reached

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' TestPoint 3 Trip Time
item_prototype.description: The measured round trip time of this test point

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' TX bytes
item_prototype.description: The accumulative bytes that this interface transmitted

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' TX packets
item_prototype.description: The accumulative packets that this interface transmitted

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' Uplink speed
item_prototype.description: Link speed bandwidth in kilobits per second of outgoing traffic

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' UtilizationRx
item_prototype.description: Utilization of receive side in percentage of link speed

item_prototype.name: WAN '$1 interface' UtilizationTx
item_prototype.description: Utilization of transmit side in percentage of link speed

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} All test points of {#SNMPWANALIAS} are not accessible
trigger_prototype.description: All of the ip addresses (test points) are not accessible via this interface

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} RX Utilization of {#SNMPWANALIAS} is more than 85%
trigger_prototype.description: Inform about the average RX utilization of {#SNMPWANALIAS} interface

trigger_prototype.name: {HOST.NAME} TX Utilization of {#SNMPWANALIAS} is more than 85%
trigger_prototype.description: Inform about the average TX utilization of {#SNMPWANALIAS} interface
